DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine physical exercise reduce adverse change adipose tissue metabolism insulin sensitivity occur woman menopausal transition .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Physical Training Adipose Tissue Metabolism Insulin Sensitivity Menopausal Transition Phase
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal OR Postmenopausal ( 4557 year ) No chronical Diseases BMI > 18,5 < 30 Sedentary ( regular physical activity last 2 year ) Either regular bleeding ( premenopausal ) OR menstruation least 2 year ( postmenopausal ) Plasma measurement : Premenopausal : estradiol > 0.20nmol/l , Follicle Stimulating Hormone < 22 IU/l progesterone > 2.5 nmol/l Postmenopausal : estradiol < 0.20nmol/l , Follicle Stimulating Hormone > 22 IU/l progesterone 0.32.5 nmol/l Smoking Excessive alcohol intake Regular medication include hormone replacement treatment
